title: Monster Survivors
description: Survive waves of monsters in this exciting action game. Upgrade your weapons and abilities to become stronger!
howToPlay: Click Play Now to start the game
Use WASD to move your character
Collect power-ups to enhance your abilities
Survive as long as possible to achieve high scores

beginner: Start with basic weapons and focus on movement
intermediate: Prioritize power-ups based on your situation

storyBackground: In a world overrun by monsters, you are one of the last survivors. Armed with various weapons and power-ups, you must fight to survive against endless waves of increasingly difficult enemies.
developerNotes: Monster Survivors is designed to provide an engaging and challenging survival experience. The game features progressive difficulty and various power-ups to keep players engaged.

title: Stardust Demon Demo
description: A fun and engaging classic HTML game that brings back the nostalgia of early web gaming.
howToPlay: Click Play Now to start the game
Use arrow keys or WASD to control
Try to achieve the highest score
storyBackground: This classic HTML game brings back the golden age of browser gaming, offering a simple yet engaging experience that can be enjoyed by players of all ages.
developerNotes: The game is optimized for modern browsers while maintaining the authentic feel of classic HTML games.

title: Giant Rush
description: Run and jump through obstacles in this exciting endless runner game!
howToPlay: Use arrow keys or WASD to control your character
Jump over obstacles using the spacebar
Collect power-ups to enhance your abilities
Try to reach the highest score possible

beginner: Start slow and learn the timing of jumps
Watch out for different types of obstacles
intermediate: Learn to chain combos for bonus points
Master the timing of special moves
advanced: Maximize your score with power-up combinations

storyBackground: In a world where giants roam the land, you must run and jump through various obstacles to survive. Collect power-ups and special abilities to become even stronger and reach new heights!
developerNotes: Giant Rush is designed to be accessible yet challenging, with smooth controls and engaging gameplay mechanics that keep players coming back for more.
